title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on Mahomes Criticism, Plus Deshaun Watson Trade Rumors and Raiders Post-Gruden Bounce with Mike Silver
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on Mahomes Criticism, Plus Deshaun Watson Trade Rumors and Raiders Post-Gruden Bounce with Mike Silver
description:
Colin talks about the NFL coaching hires that are backfiring, why the Browns and Steelers are getting lapped by the Bengals (3:00), the reason Belichick poured on the points against the Jets (7:00), why it's clear that the Dolphins have moved on from Tua for Deshaun Watson (9:00), and why the media is afraid to criticize Mahomes (12:00), and then what Joe Burrow has overcome that other QBs haven't (15:00). Then NFL writer Mike Silver and Colin discuss whether Derrick Henry's impact has become overrated (22:00), which teams should seriously consider acquiring Deshaun Watson (26:00), the complicated history between Sean McVay and his ex-QB Jared Goff (30:00), if there's a case to made for Kyler Murray as the NFL's best player (34:00), the story behind the Cardinals' massive turnaround this season, why the Raiders are succeeding without Jon Gruden (38:00).

Make sure you subscribe NOW! Also, follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
